# Home Sliders extension for Refinery CMS.

## How to build this extension as a gem

    cd vendor/extensions/home_sliders
    gem build refinerycms-home_sliders.gemspec
    gem install refinerycms-home_sliders.gem

    # Sign up for a http://rubygems.org/ account and publish the gem
    gem push refinerycms-home_sliders.gem
